EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #18.2019 Dealer Update #18
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - August 5, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | August 2019
FANS1/A+ & PM-CPDLC Upgrade
- This bulletin announces the availability of an upgrade program to provide FANS 1/A+ operations and PM-CPDLC capability for operators with F900A/B/C/EX, Citation X, CL601, Legacy 600/650 and DO-328 - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-33 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-33-Rev-A_FANS-1A-PM-CPDLC-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/kQ0Iq0Z002002IG00D0r00X]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
FANS1/A+ & PM-CPDLC Upgrade
- This bulletin announces the availability of an Upgrade Program to provide FANS 1/A+ operations and PM-CPDLC capability for operators with F900A/B/C/EX, CL601 and Legacy 600/650 aircraft, already equipped with Mark III CMU - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-34 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-34-Rev-A_PM-CPDLC-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-Mk-III-to-Mk-II-Plus.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​
- For Hawker 800 A/B/XP and Hawker 1000 A/B owners, Honeywell is pleased to offer discounted pricing for ADS-B Out compliance and FMS 6.1 software upgrade. This limited time package offering will be managed using equipment exchanges and on-wing software update, minimizing aircraft downtime. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-35 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-35-Rev-A_Hawker-800-1000-Special-Offering-FMS-6-1-ADSB.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
